## Usage

```{r setup}
library(rbibtools)
```

```{r 'import'}
## Import bib files ----
path_to_bibs <- system.file("extdata", package = "rbibtools")
refs <- read_bib(path = path_to_bibs)
```

```{r 'preview'}
knitr::kable(refs[1:4, 1:8])
```

```{r 'export', eval = FALSE}
rbibtools::write_bib(refs, file = "references.bib")
```
